medical_history.chief_complaint: Hearing loss and facial dysmorphic features in a 12-day-old male.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms were noted at 12 days of age when the child's initial hearing screen was performed. Hearing loss evaluation tests continued until 23 months of age, and growth retardation was observed with severe short stature and weight under the 3rd centile.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient's mother suffered from gestational hypertension and gestational diabetes during pregnancy.
